products.title: Splash Vine Green 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Breathe life into your living space with this splash vine green vertical blind. Vertical blinds add a stylish, modern look and this light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this green vertical blind is one of their favourites - especially for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.
